description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A unique 3D platformer that starts out easy enough but soon supplies tension in gargantuan degrees! Wrestle with 50 challenging levels as new elements appear and old ones change. Take to multiplayer to experience something new where every one of 20 levels fundamentally changes play. Though your ultimate aim is to come out on top, sometimes survival takes a higher priority.
description.short: A unique 3D platformer that starts out easy enough but soon supplies tension in gargantuan degrees! Wrestle with 50 challenging levels as new elements appear and old ones change. Take to multiplayer to experience something new where every one of 20 levels fundamentally changes play. Though your ultimate aim is to come out on top, sometimes survival takes a higher priority.
